alert.note: Alert for Marion (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 9:08PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Marion County through 945 PM EDT... At 908 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was centered just southwest of Marion Estates, or 11 miles north of Buena Vista. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Marion Estates and Oakland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
